nodes.text: Lamarebb was a gas giant in the Lamaro system. It was very close to the sun, Lamaro, and orbited close to the second planet, Lamarecc.

Every fourteen years, Lamarebb and Lamarecc approached each other until almost rubbing. This caused a natural phenomenom of lights in the skies of the third planet of the system, Lamaredd, and also scrambled communications.
Like the other planets in the system, Lamarebb probably owed its etymology to a notation in an old star map.
